ActorTalk: ...We'll use Miss Lucia's computing power to correct any data errors in real time during the screening.
The repair process is tedious and boring. It will disrupt the story's continuity and seriously affect the immersive experience. Are you sure you want to use this method?
You two really are loyal to the source material, huh... Alright, follow me. I'll reconfigure the system for you.
Just a heads-up, data errors can take many forms. The most common is the protagonist missing a key item, which stops the story from progressing.
When that happens, keep an eye on your surroundings. The missing item is usually tucked away somewhere easy to overlook.
Yes. We want to see the original story.
